name.en: The Noodle Art of Flavor Modulation
name.ja: <ruby>火<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>麺<rt>めん</rt></ruby><ruby>味<rt>あじ</rt></ruby><ruby>変<rt>へん</rt></ruby><ruby>化<rt>げ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>術<rt>じゅつ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During a turn you have not activated "The Noodle Art of Flavor Modulation", reveal 1 FIRE Attribute Fusion Monster with 2900 ATK in your Extra Deck, and declare 1 card name listed as material on that monster.

effect.en: This turn, the name of 1 face-up monster on your field becomes the name declared to meet the requirement.
